description:
Gohan spends his day tormenting a T-Rex. Across the planet, Tien and Chiaotzu find their training interrupted by Launch. Meanwhile, Goku tries to find King Kai on Snake Way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hebi no Michi de Inemuri Gokuu ga Okkochiru
Um pequeno descanso! Goku cai do caminho da serpente
เผลอหลับกลางเส้นทางงูเลื้อย โกคูตกลงไปซะแล้ว
蛇の道でいねむり悟空が落っこちる
